thread.title: Best view I have ever had in NYC
thread.title_full: Best view I have ever had in NYC - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa K
title: Best view I have ever had in NYC
text:
I have stayed at this property twice and it feels so upscale for a Residence Inn. Best of all is the wrap around window view of the city and central park I have been lucky enough to have each time I have stayed. The kitchenette in super modern and space is used so well. Breakfast is very good and the breakfast room is very chic as well. This is definitely a favorite on my list.
Room Tip: Beg for a room on a high floor with a view of the park. See more room tips Green Features: I did have a recycle bin in my room and I used it.
